mini manatee please don t hesitate to email me at hello@theresascrochetshop com if you have any questions along the way have fun materials you will need crochet hook size g/4mm worsted weight yarn gray yarn needle one pair of 7 mm safety eyes* polyester fiber fill stuffing *note safety eyes can be found on etsy amazon ebay or your local craft store the safety eyes are highly recommended but they can be substituted with black buttons or yarn if you prefer final measurement for the finished mini manatee will be 4 5 inches 12 cm long and 2 inches 5 cm tall abbreviations chain s chain s single_crochet single_crochet sts stitches decrease single_crochet decrease st* *single_crochet decrease stitch explanation insert the hook into the next stitch and yarn over pull a loop through so that there are now 2 loops on the hook insert the hook into the next stitch and yarn over pull a loop through so that there are now 3 loops on the hook yarn over again and pull the loop of yarn through all 3 loops on the hook note #1 this pattern is crocheted in continuous row you will not join each row except when making the muzzle note #2 in my patterns i begin each circle with chain 2 6 single_crochet in first chain another way of beginning is to start with a magic_ring if you are more familiar with this method just do 6 single_crochet into your magic_ring baby manatee s body row 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in first chain 6 sts r2 single_crochet 2 in each st around 12 sts r3 single_crochet 1 2 single_crochet in next st 6 times 18 sts r4 single_crochet 18 18 sts r5 single_crochet 2 2 single_crochet in next st 6 times 24 sts r6-9 single_crochet 24 4 total row now insert your 7mm safety eyes between r3 and r4 of the body about 6 sts apart across the top as pictured above firmly press the washers onto the backs of the eyes continue on with the body r10 single_crochet 6 decrease 1 3 times 21 sts r11 single_crochet 21 21 sts r12 single_crochet 5 decrease 1 3 times 18 sts r13 single_crochet 18 18 sts begin stuffing the body r14 single_crochet 4 decrease 1 3 times 15 sts r15 single_crochet 3 decrease 1 3 times 12 sts r16 decrease 1 6 times fasten_off leaving a yarn tail for sewing add a little more stuffing as needed use the yarn tail to weave through the front loops of the 6 sts and pull tight to
